title: Primary risk assessment of microplastic pollution in spineless cuttlefish (Sepiella inermis) from the North-East Bay of Bengal: A tissue-based analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Sourav Bar, Soumik Dhara, Jhumpa Majhi, Dipak Bisai, Edris Alam, Md Kamrul Islam, Uday Chatterjee, Sudipta Kumar Ghorai
